definition: to wade/to be involved/to concern/to experience/to enter (classical)

sentences.english: It has peculiar character comparing with other interferometers.
sentences.chinese: 與其它干涉儀相比，具有獨特的優點。

sentences.english: The application of Michelson interference principle in measuring small displacement is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹邁克爾遜干涉儀原理在測微小位移中的應用。

sentences.english: Compared with the common Sagnac interferometers , its dynamic range is extended.
sentences.chinese: 與一般干涉儀相比其工作動態範圍可以擴大數百倍。

sentences.english: The ultrasonic interference mercury manometer of NBS represents the highest level in the world.
sentences.chinese: NBS超聲干涉儀水銀壓力計，爲國際最高水平。

sentences.english: A method of measuring gas concentration with Michelson interferometer is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹用邁克爾遜干涉儀測量氣體濃度的一種方法。

sentences.english: Active mirror is one of the key parts in the stellar interferometer.
sentences.chinese: 主動鏡是恆星光干涉儀中的關鍵部件之一。

sentences.english: The second image is obtained by rotating the cross-grating interferometer an angle about its axis of symmetry.
sentences.chinese: 將光柵干涉儀繞其對稱軸轉過一角度，得到第二個像。

sentences.english: A multi-wavelength diode laser interferometer for the measurement of surface profiles has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 採用多波長二極管激光器干涉儀測量表面輪廓。

sentences.english: The polarization of light is not negligible in the interferometers.
sentences.chinese: 在干涉儀中，光的偏振態是不可忽視的。

sentences.english: An interferometer invented by Michelson was used by Michelson and Morely.
sentences.chinese: 邁克耳孫和莫雷使用一臺邁克耳孫發明的干涉儀。

sentences.english: A beam splitter is one of the main working parts in any interferometer.
sentences.chinese: 分束器是所有干涉儀裏主要工作元件之一。

sentences.english: A holographic three-slit interferometer is described in which the phase of one lateral slit is modulated.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了調製一條邊縫光路位相的全息三縫干涉儀。

sentences.english: Several kind of applications of infrared interferometer is researched.
sentences.chinese: 深入研究了紅外干涉儀的多種應用途徑。

sentences.english: This paper analyses and studies the interferometer made of self-focusing bar.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析並研究了用自聚焦棒做成的干涉儀。

sentences.english: The simulation results show that, this method is effective to obtain precise direction of LBI baseline.
sentences.chinese: 仿真表明，該算法能夠有效獲得干涉儀的空間指向。

sentences.english: The two LIGO interferometers work together as one observatory.
sentences.chinese: 這二套LIGO干涉儀在一起工作構成一個觀測所。
